Title: RSTEIN Posterous API C# Wrapper
Description:
Posterous C# API wrapper-for Silverlight (SL 4) & .NF 3.5 & WP7
Only Posterous API  1.0 is supported.
Included is project "Posterous backup"  - Simple example that demonstrates use of API wrappper.
Machine  translation of my article about API:
http://jdem.cz/hcss2
Enjoy
